## Contributing

> [!NOTE]
> **Contributions welcome!** This component follows Kingdom Technology standards.

### How to Contribute

1. **Fork and branch:**

   ```bash
   git checkout -b feature/component-enhancement
   ```

2. **Make changes:**
   - Follow [4-Block Structure](../../standards/CWS-STD-001-DOC-4-block.md)
   - Add tests for new functionality
   - Update API documentation

3. **Test thoroughly:**

   ```bash
   [test-command]
   ```

4. **Submit PR with:**
   - Clear description of changes
   - Updated API documentation
   - Test coverage maintained/improved

**Standards to follow:**

- [4-Block Structure](../../standards/CWS-STD-001-DOC-4-block.md)
- [Document Keying](../../standards/CWS-STD-002-DOC-document-keying.md)
- [Documentation Standards](../../standards/CWS-STD-003-DOC-documentation-standards.md)
